description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

John D. Cook - PhD in applied math at University of Texas and a postdoc at Vanderbilt

ABSTRACT
 R is an unusual language with a huge treasure trove of useful statistical libraries. Many developers want to take advantage of R's libraries for part of a project but want to develop the rest of the project in other languages.  [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7749

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
